actor_awards.notes: Inducted as a Disney Legend in 2011. Before his Hollywood career, he was a successful fashion model.

filmography.title: The Sign of Zorro
filmography.role: Don Diego de la Vega / Zorro
filmography.role_description: A masked vigilante who fights corruption in early California while posing as a foppish nobleman.
filmography.plot: Don Diego returns to Los Angeles to find it under the rule of a tyrant, forcing him to adopt the secret identity of Zorro to fight for justice.

filmography.title: Zorro the Avenger
filmography.role: Don Diego de la Vega / Zorro
filmography.role_description: The masked hero continues his fight against injustice in this theatrical compilation of TV episodes.
filmography.plot: Zorro battles a new villain, the Eagle, who is plotting to take over California.

filmography.title: Captain Sindbad
filmography.role_description: The legendary sailor who must complete impossible tasks to save his love and a kingdom.
filmography.plot: Sindbad returns to Baristan to marry the princess but finds the city ruled by a tyrant who has replaced the king.

filmography.title: Damon and Pythias
filmography.role_description: A Greek Pythagorean philosopher who offers his life as a pledge for his friend Pythias.
filmography.plot: In ancient Syracuse, two friends' loyalty is tested when one is condemned to death and the other offers to take his place until he returns.

filmography.title: The Prince and the Pauper
filmography.role_description: A kind nobleman who protects the pauper-turned-prince and helps him regain his identity.
filmography.plot: A poor boy and a prince trade places, leading to adventures and a lesson in how the other half lives.

filmography.title: I Was a Teenage Werewolf
filmography.role_description: A police officer who tries to stop the rampaging teenage werewolf.
filmography.plot: A troubled teenager is regressed to a primal state by a mad hypnotherapist, transforming him into a murderous werewolf.

filmography.title: The Man from the Alamo
filmography.role_description: A soldier in the story of a man branded a coward for leaving the Alamo.
filmography.plot: The only survivor of the Alamo is branded a coward and must prove his bravery while protecting a wagon train.

filmography.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
filmography.role_description: An uncredited role as a radar operator at the beginning of the film.
filmography.plot: An alien lands on Earth and tells the people of the world that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Film Promoting International Understanding

filmography.title: Seven Angry Men
filmography.role_description: One of abolitionist John Brown's sons who participates in his crusade against slavery.
filmography.plot: The story of John Brown's crusade to end slavery, leading to the raid on Harpers Ferry.

filmography.title: The Mississippi Gambler
filmography.role_description: A character involved in the riverboat gambling scene.
filmography.plot: An honest gambler tries to run a crooked game on a Mississippi riverboat and falls for an aristocratic Southern belle.

filmography.title: Bonzo Goes to College
filmography.role_description: A character in this comedy sequel about a chimp who joins a college football team.
filmography.plot: A chimp runs away from a carnival and ends up becoming the star quarterback for a college football team.

filmography.title: The Last Frontier
filmography.role_description: A cavalry officer stationed at a remote outpost during the Civil War.
filmography.plot: Three scouts for the cavalry are assigned to a remote outpost where the commander is obsessed with glory.

filmography.title: Sincerely Yours
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in this Liberace vehicle.
filmography.plot: A famous pianist goes deaf and learns lip reading, which he uses to help people with their problems.

filmography.title: The Golden Blade
filmography.role_description: A small uncredited role as the town crier of Baghdad.
filmography.plot: A commoner discovers a magical sword and uses it to free Baghdad from an evil vizier.

filmography.title: Take Me to Town
filmography.role_description: A small role as a performer in a stage show.
filmography.plot: A saloon singer on the run hides out in a small town and charms a widower and his three sons.

filmography.title: Back at the Front
filmography.role_description: An uncredited role as an officer in this comedy about Willie and Joe.
filmography.plot: Willie and Joe are drafted back into the army and sent to Tokyo, where they get involved with smugglers.

filmography.title: The Beginning or the End
filmography.role_description: A small role as the bombardier on the plane that dropped the atomic bomb.
filmography.plot: A docudrama recounting the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

filmography.title: Lost in Space (TV Series)
filmography.role_description: The courageous and intelligent leader of the Robinson family's expedition into deep space.
filmography.plot: The Robinson family is thrown off course during a space mission and must survive in deep space while trying to find their way home.
filmography.awards: Primetime Emmy: Nomination – Outstanding Special Visual Effects (Series)

filmography.title: Bonanza (TV Series)
filmography.role_description: Ben Cartwright's nephew who arrives at the Ponderosa; Williams was brought in as a potential replacement for Pernell Roberts.
filmography.plot: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons on their Nevada ranch, the Ponderosa.

filmography.title: Zorro (TV Series)
filmography.role: Don Diego de la Vega / Zorro
filmography.role_description: The definitive portrayal of the masked rider who fights tyranny in Spanish California.
filmography.plot: In the 1820s, a Spanish nobleman fights against corrupt local officials in California under the guise of the masked hero Zorro.
